rules: All pages must load cleanly on desktop and mobile with no console errors.
Page content must align with the Cali Drive Kit branding and professional tone.
Typography must maintain a consistent hierarchy (H1, H2, H3) and spacing rhythm.
Hero sections should use responsive background images with 4.5:1 contrast or better.
Buttons, inputs, and forms must include hover, focus, and active states.
Mobile CLS (Cumulative Layout Shift) must be below 0.1.
No placeholder or lorem text should remain anywhere.
Forms must validate input and display inline error/success messages.
Generated guides or documents must be well-structured, readable, and formatted for print (page breaks, section headers, consistent tone).
Any downloadable assets (PDFs, docs) must render correctly without text overflow or missing images.
